verbs.description: If [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: wants] [ARG1: China to see him as a paper tiger] , the American president is succeeding beautifully .
If Donald Trump wants [ARG0: China] to [V: see] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: as a paper tiger] , the American president is succeeding beautifully .
If Donald Trump wants China to see him as a paper tiger , the American president [V: is] succeeding beautifully .
[ARGM-ADV: If Donald Trump wants China to see him as a paper tiger] , [ARG0: the American president] is [V: succeeding] [ARGM-MNR: beautifully] .
